title.narrative: INTEGRATED Early Child Development (ECD)

description.narrative: Relevant MDAs operationalise national policy on Integrated Early Childhood Development (IECD), which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Early Learning. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved learning outcomes and equitable and inclusive education

related-activity.ref: 4550/A0/04/105 EQUITY AND QUALITY OF BASIC EDUCATION

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Relevant MDAs operationalise national policy on Integrated Early Childhood Development (IECD)

description.narrative: With the inclusion of one year of pre-primary education in the fee free education policy, there has been a significant increase in net enrollment from 41 % in 2011 to 81% in 2016. Sustaining these gains will be subject for advocacy on budget allocations for pre-primary education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/08/2016

title.narrative: Number of pre-service teachers enrolled in an Early Childhood Development Course at the State University of Zanzibar

Status of IECD components in Child Development Policy

baseline.value: No costed IECD components in the Child Development Policy

target.value: 2016:Child Development Policy with IECD costed Implementation Plan approved

actual.value: 2016:IECD components integrated in revised Child Development Policy, pre-primary included in Education Policy and Sector Plan.

title.narrative: Number of districts that have cost effective and scalable alternative models for pre-primary education in their MTEF
